description: Try our easy to follow Carrot Cakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Carrot Cakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup Uncle Tobys Oats Traditional Porridge
0.25 cup Macro Light & Golden Rice Malt Syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, to make date cream cheese icing, process dates and 2 tablespoons boiling water until almost smooth, scraping down the side of the bowl. Add remaining ingredients; process until smooth and combined. Spread icing over cooled cake tops; scatter with extra pecans.
